languages.text: {n}Мужчина с лохматыми космами темных волос одет и вооружен примерно так же, как все прочие в помещении. И все же в нем безошибочно чувствуется лидер. Он делает шаг вам навстречу. Усмехается. Разводит руки в жесте приветствия.{/n} "Гости! Как радостно вас видеть в моем скромном убежище. Вижу, вы пришли приобщиться к истине. Выбирайте — словами или огнем и металлом?"

{n}The man with a shaggy mop of dark hair is dressed and armed about as well as everyone else in here. And yet he is unmistakably the leader. He takes a step toward you. He chuckles. He spreads his arms wide in a welcoming gesture.{/n} "My guests! What a joy it is to see you in my humble refuge. I see you've come here to be introduced to the truth. Which will you choose, then — words, or fire and metal?"
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина с лохматыми космами темных волос одет и вооружен примерно так же, как все прочие в помещении. И все же в нем безошибочно чувствуется лидер. Он делает шаг вам навстречу. Усмехается. Разводит руки в жесте приветствия.{/n} "Гости! Как радостно вас видеть в моем скромном убежище. Вижу, вы пришли приобщиться к истине. Выбирайте — словами или огнем и металлом?"

traits.locale_text: {n}This man with a shaggy mop of dark hair is dressed and armed about as well as everyone else in here. And yet he is, unmistakably, the leader. He takes a step toward you. He chuckles. He spreads his arms wide in a welcoming gesture.{/n} "My guests! What a joy it is to see you in my humble refuge. I see you've come to have yourselves introduced to the truth. Which will you choose, then — words or fire and metal?"

Which will you choose, then — words, or fire and metal?"

languages.text: {n}这个男人留着蓬松的黑发，他的衣着与武器和其他人看起来没什么区别，但他毫无疑问就是这群人的领袖。他朝你走了一步，笑了起来，张开双臂，做出了欢迎的姿态。{/n}“我的客人们！能在我简陋的避难所里见到你们，真是太令人开心了。我看得出来，你们来这里是为了得到真理。那么，你们要选择哪个呢？是谈话，还是火焰与金属？”
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a shaggy mop of dark hair is dressed and armed about as well as everyone else in here. And yet he is unmistakably the leader. He takes a step toward you. He chuckles. He spreads his arms wide in a welcoming gesture.{/n} "My guests! What a joy it is to see you in my humble refuge. I see you've come here to be introduced to the truth. Which will you choose, then — words, or fire and metal?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个男人留着蓬松的黑发，他的衣着与武器和其他人看起来没什么区别，但他毫无疑问就是这群人的领袖。他朝你走了一步，笑了起来，张开双臂，做出了欢迎的姿态。{/n}“我的客人们！能在我简陋的避难所里见到你们，真是太令人开心了。我看得出来，你们来这里是为了得到真理。那么，你们要选择哪个呢？是谈话，还是火焰与金属？”

languages.text: {n}El hombre, de melena oscura, está vestido y armado igual que los demás, y sin embargo no queda duda de que es el líder. Se ríe y abre los brazos en señal de bienvenida.{/n} «¡Tenemos visita! Que alegría veros en mi humilde refugio. Veo que venís a descubrir la verdad. ¿Qué preferís, la palabrería o el fuego y el metal?».
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a shaggy mop of dark hair is dressed and armed about as well as everyone else in here. And yet he is unmistakably the leader. He takes a step toward you. He chuckles. He spreads his arms wide in a welcoming gesture.{/n} "My guests! What a joy it is to see you in my humble refuge. I see you've come here to be introduced to the truth. Which will you choose, then — words, or fire and metal?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre, de melena oscura, está vestido y armado igual que los demás, y sin embargo no queda duda de que es el líder. Se ríe y abre los brazos en señal de bienvenida.{/n} «¡Tenemos visita! Que alegría veros en mi humilde refugio. Veo que venís a descubrir la verdad. ¿Qué preferís, la palabrería o el fuego y el metal?».

languages.text: {n}暗くてモジャモジャな髪の毛の男は、その場にいる者達と同じく、しっかり武装している。どう見てもリーダー格のその男は、こちらに一歩近づいて来る。ククッと笑いながら、ようこそと両腕を広げて見せる。{/n}「客人よ！我が慎ましい隠れ家で会えるとはなんと喜ばしいことか。真実を確かめに来たようですな。さて、どちらを選ぶかな…言葉か、それとも火と金属か？」
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a shaggy mop of dark hair is dressed and armed about as well as everyone else in here. And yet he is unmistakably the leader. He takes a step toward you. He chuckles. He spreads his arms wide in a welcoming gesture.{/n} "My guests! What a joy it is to see you in my humble refuge. I see you've come here to be introduced to the truth. Which will you choose, then — words, or fire and metal?"

traits.locale_text: {n}暗くてモジャモジャな髪の毛の男は、その場にいる者達と同じく、しっかり武装している。どう見てもリーダー格のその男は、こちらに一歩近づいて来る。ククッと笑いながら、ようこそと両腕を広げて見せる。{/n}「客人よ！我が慎ましい隠れ家で会えるとはなんと喜ばしいことか。真実を確かめに来たようですな。さて、どちらを選ぶかな…言葉か、それとも火と金属か？」

languages.text: {n}Der Mann hat einen verfilzten, dunklen Wuschelkopf und ist ebenso gut gekleidet und bewaffnet wie alle anderen hier. Und dennoch ist er unzweifelhaft ihr Anführer. Er macht einen Schritt auf dich zu. Er kichert. Er breitet in einer Willkommensgeste die Arme aus.{/n} "Meine Gäste! Welch Glanz in meiner bescheidenen Hütte! Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr hergefunden, um die Wahrheit zu erfahren. Was werdet Ihr nun wählen – Worte oder Feuer und Metall?"
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a shaggy mop of dark hair is dressed and armed about as well as everyone else in here. And yet he is unmistakably the leader. He takes a step toward you. He chuckles. He spreads his arms wide in a welcoming gesture.{/n} "My guests! What a joy it is to see you in my humble refuge. I see you've come here to be introduced to the truth. Which will you choose, then — words, or fire and metal?"

Er macht einen Schritt auf dich zu. Er kichert. Er breitet in einer Willkommensgeste die Arme aus.{/n} "Meine Gäste! Welch Glanz in meiner bescheidenen Hütte! Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr hergefunden, um die Wahrheit zu erfahren. Was werdet Ihr nun wählen – Worte oder Feuer und Metall?"

languages.text: {n}Si l'homme aux cheveux noirs en broussaille est vêtu et armé comme n'importe qui d'autre ici, de toute évidence il est le leader de la bande. Il s'avance vers vous et rit, avant d'écarter les bras dans un geste accueillant.{/n} « Chers invités ! Quel plaisir de vous voir dans mon humble refuge. Je vois que vous êtes venus découvrir la vérité. Alors, qu'allez-vous choisir ? Les paroles, ou le feu et le métal ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a shaggy mop of dark hair is dressed and armed about as well as everyone else in here. And yet he is unmistakably the leader. He takes a step toward you. He chuckles. He spreads his arms wide in a welcoming gesture.{/n} "My guests! What a joy it is to see you in my humble refuge. I see you've come here to be introduced to the truth. Which will you choose, then — words, or fire and metal?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Si l'homme aux cheveux noirs en broussaille est vêtu et armé comme que n'importe qui d'autre ici, de toute évidence il est le leader de la bande. Il s'avance vers vous et rit, avant d'écarter les bras dans un geste accueillant.{/n} « Chers invités ! Quel plaisir de vous voir dans mon humble refuge. Je vois que vous êtes venus découvrir la vérité. Alors, qu'allez-vous choisir ? Les paroles, ou le feu et le métal ? »

languages.text: {n}Dağınık koyu saçlara sahip adam, buradaki hemen hemen herkes gibi giyinip silahlanmış. Yine de liderleri olduğu aşikâr. Sana doğru bir adım atıyor. Gülüyor. Karşılama yaparcasına kollarını iki yana açıyor.{/n} "Konuklarım gelmiş! Sizi mütevazı sığınağımda görmek ne büyük keyif. Anladığım kadarıyla hakikatla tanışmaya gelmişsiniz. O zaman seçin: Kelimeler mi konuşsun, yoksa ateşle metal mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The man with a shaggy mop of dark hair is dressed and armed about as well as everyone else in here. And yet he is unmistakably the leader. He takes a step toward you. He chuckles. He spreads his arms wide in a welcoming gesture.{/n} "My guests! What a joy it is to see you in my humble refuge. I see you've come here to be introduced to the truth. Which will you choose, then — words, or fire and metal?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dağınık koyu saçlara sahip adam, buradaki herkes gibi giyinip silahlanmış. Yine de liderleri olduğu aşikâr. Sana doğru bir adım atıyor. Kıkırdıyor. Kollarını, karşılar gibi iki yana açıyor.{/n} "Konuklarım gelmiş! Sizi mütevazı sığınağımda görmek ne büyük zevk. Anladığım kadarıyla hakikat ile tanışmaya gelmişsiniz. O zaman seçin, kelimeler mi konuşsun ateş ile metal mi?"
